description: Monitoring of internal JMX metrics from the OpenNMS Core system collected via JMX exporter for Prometheus.

panels.description: These calculations are experimental and need yet to be compared and validated against known correct results.  The way it is built does not work for multiple simultaneous JVMs, so accuracy requires selecting only one.
